thread.title: ​This Guy Got Caught Cheating by Commenting On Burger King’s Instagram
thread.title_full: ​This Guy Got Caught Cheating by Commenting On Burger King’s Instagram

author: Barry K
title: ​This Guy Got Caught Cheating by Commenting On Burger King’s Instagram
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Instagramming Burger King to complain about your girl’s crazy long drive-thru wait time? That’s kind of chivalrous. Having your actual girlfriend spot your post? D’oh. Some dude who goes by the handle @jordan_vonsmith86 recently took to Instagram to call out Burger King, saying “My girl legit took 20 minutes ordering in the drive thru last night.” 
Maybe he was worried he’d end up on some kind of BK blacklist, because he was quick to add “those Whoppers were worth it tho.” But instead of angering The King, he pissed off his queen. Von Smith’s girlfriend spotted his post, and promptly made it clear she had been nowhere near a Burger King—and was not happy with her man. (Check out The Daily Mail’s recap of the saga for the hilarious screenshots, including the ones below.) Advertisement
